title: The CEO: Interview with Dr. C. William Pollard - Part 2
itunes:title: The CEO: Interview with Dr. C. William Pollard - Part 2
description: Join us for the second half of our interview with Dr. C. William Pollard, former CEO of ServiceMaster, which includes insights on the Faith @ Work movement and his friendship with Billy Graham.
